hadiths.text: It was narrated that Safwan bin 'Assal said:"The Prophet (ﷺ) granted us a dispensation when traveling, allowing us not to take off our Khuffs for three days and three nights

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّوْقِيتِ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْخُفَّيْنِ لِلْمُسَافِرِ
chapter.eng-name: Time Limit For Wiping Over The Khuffs
